Text: For those wondering: you actually don't need the MasterFix, after you apply the patch there is a fixed exe that you can try first (always remember to backup the old files you are overwriting). That file works better in most cases, however if that doesn't work you have the MasterFix already there (or you can download the torrent from the links in the description).
